trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: 将转换<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>对象与其他类型。

trans-unit.source: The MouseActionConverter class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: MouseActionConverter 类仅将转换<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>到和从一种<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String></xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction>的一个实例

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseActionConverter"></xref> class.
Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>,using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定类型的对象是否可以转换为的实例<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"> </xref>，使用指定的上下文。

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关从中调用此转换器的环境的信息的格式上下文。

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this converter can perform the operation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该转换器能够执行该操作;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: 确定实例是否<xref href="System.Windows.Input.MouseAction"></xref>可以转换为指定的类型，使用指定的上下文。
